articles.title: Cursor Raises $900M at $9.9B Valuation, Soars Past $500M ARR
articles.content: Anysphere, maker of the AI-powered code editor Cursor, has raised $900 million in Series C funding at a $9.9 billion valuation, making it one of the fastest-growing startups in history.
articles.summary: Anysphere, maker of the AI-powered code editor Cursor, has raised $900 million in Series C funding at a $9.9 billion valuation, making it one of the fastest-growing startups in history.

articles.title: OpenAI Acquires Windsurf for $3 Billion
articles.content: OpenAI has completed its acquisition of Windsurf (formerly Codeium) for $3 billion, marking one of the largest AI tooling acquisitions to date.
articles.summary: OpenAI has completed its acquisition of Windsurf (formerly Codeium) for $3 billion, marking one of the largest AI tooling acquisitions to date.

articles.title: Anthropic Launches Claude 4 with Record 72.7% SWE-bench Score
articles.content: Anthropic has released Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet models, achieving a record-breaking 72.7% score on SWE-bench Verified, far exceeding previous benchmarks.
articles.summary: Anthropic has released Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet models, achieving a record-breaking 72.7% score on SWE-bench Verified, far exceeding previous benchmarks.

articles.title: Google Unveils Jules AI Coding Agent at I/O 2025
articles.content: Google announced Jules, an autonomous AI coding agent powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro, achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench Verified during public beta launch.
articles.summary: Google announced Jules, an autonomous AI coding agent powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro, achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench Verified during public beta launch.

articles.title: Cognition AI Hits $4 Billion Valuation in Latest Funding Round
articles.content: Devin creator Cognition AI has raised $290 million in Series B funding at a $4 billion valuation, led by 8VC and Lonsdale Capital.
articles.summary: Devin creator Cognition AI has raised $290 million in Series B funding at a $4 billion valuation, led by 8VC and Lonsdale Capital.

articles.title: Lovable Raises $15M After Spectacular Growth to 800K Users
articles.content: Swedish AI app builder Lovable has raised $15 million in pre-Series A funding after growing to 800,000 users building 25,000 apps daily.
articles.summary: Swedish AI app builder Lovable has raised $15 million in pre-Series A funding after growing to 800,000 users building 25,000 apps daily.

articles.title: StackBlitz (Bolt.new) Reaches $700M Valuation Talks
articles.content: StackBlitz, creator of Bolt.new, is in talks for Series B funding at a $700 million valuation following explosive growth to $40M ARR.
articles.summary: StackBlitz, creator of Bolt.new, is in talks for Series B funding at a $700 million valuation following explosive growth to $40M ARR.

articles.title: GitHub Copilot Introduces Multi-Model Support and Coding Agents
articles.content: GitHub has launched multi-model Copilot supporting Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini alongside GPT-4, plus new autonomous coding agents for complex tasks.
articles.summary: GitHub has launched multi-model Copilot supporting Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini alongside GPT-4, plus new autonomous coding agents for complex tasks.

articles.title: Devin 2.0 Launches with $20/Month Pricing, Down from $500
articles.content: Cognition Labs has launched Devin 2.0 with general availability and slashed pricing from $500 to $20 per month to increase accessibility.
articles.summary: Cognition Labs has launched Devin 2.0 with general availability and slashed pricing from $500 to $20 per month to increase accessibility.

articles.title: AI Coding Tools Market Hits $2B+ in Funding as "Vibe Coding" Emerges
articles.content: The AI coding tools market has attracted over $2 billion in funding as a new generation of "vibe coding" tools allows developers to build apps through natural language.
articles.summary: The AI coding tools market has attracted over $2 billion in funding as a new generation of "vibe coding" tools allows developers to build apps through natural language.

articles.title: Google rolls out 'Scheduled Actions' on Gemini
articles.content: Google has introduced 'Scheduled Actions' on Gemini, a feature that allows users to set tasks to be executed at specific times. This was announced at Google I/O 2025 as part of the new Gemini features.
articles.summary: Google has introduced 'Scheduled Actions' on Gemini, a feature that allows users to set tasks to be executed at specific times. This was announced at Google I/O 2025 as part of the new Gemini features.

articles.title: ChatGPT o3-pro: the latest model by OpenAI
articles.content: This article discusses the differences between ChatGPT o3-pro and its predecessors, highlighting where o3-pro shows its advancements.
articles.summary: This article discusses the differences between ChatGPT o3-pro and its predecessors, highlighting where o3-pro shows its advancements.

articles.title: Top 3 Updates for Android Developer Productivity from Google I/O 25
articles.content: Google I/O 2025 showcased several updates to improve developer productivity, including Gemini in Android Studio, Jetpack Compose, and Kotlin Multiplatform. Gemini's Agent Mode was highlighted for its ability to handle complex development tasks.
articles.summary: Google I/O 2025 showcased several updates to improve developer productivity, including Gemini in Android Studio, Jetpack Compose, and Kotlin Multiplatform. Gemini's Agent Mode was highlighted for its ability to handle complex development tasks.

articles.title: Apple Reportedly in Talks to Acquire Perplexity AI to Supercharge Its Artificial Intelligence Ambitions
articles.content: Apple is reportedly negotiating to acquire Perplexity AI, a leading AI-powered search startup, to boost its artificial intelligence capabilities. The acquisition would mark Apple's boldest bet yet in the race to dominate next-generation AI and search technologies.
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly negotiating to acquire Perplexity AI, a leading AI-powered search startup, to boost its artificial intelligence capabilities. The acquisition would mark Apple's boldest bet yet in the race to dominate next-generation AI and search technologies.

articles.title: GitHub Copilot Plans to Deprecate Key AI Models by Summer 2025
articles.content: GitHub Copilot is set to deprecate several AI models, including OpenAI GPT-4.5 and GPT-4o, starting July 7, 2025. Users are advised to transition to alternative models like OpenAI GPT-4.1 and o3. The deprecation process will continue through August 6, 2025, with guidance provided for users and administrators.
articles.summary: GitHub Copilot is set to deprecate several AI models, including OpenAI GPT-4.5 and GPT-4o, starting July 7, 2025. Users are advised to transition to alternative models like OpenAI GPT-4.1 and o3. The deprecation process will continue through August 6, 2025, with guidance provided for users and administrators.

articles.title: Elon Musk aims to redefine the future of AI with the new Grok
articles.content: Elon Musk's AI model, Grok, promises to revolutionize data use by aiming for a complete rewriting of human knowledge. The upcoming Grok 3.5 will feature advanced reasoning, aiming to eliminate errors and obsolete information.
articles.summary: Elon Musk's AI model, Grok, promises to revolutionize data use by aiming for a complete rewriting of human knowledge. The upcoming Grok 3.5 will feature advanced reasoning, aiming to eliminate errors and obsolete information.

articles.title: Meta's Llama 3.1 model 'memorised' 42 per cent of Harry Potter book, new study finds
articles.content: A recent study found that Meta's Llama 3.1 AI model has memorized over 42% of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, raising concerns about copyright infringement.
articles.summary: A recent study found that Meta's Llama 3.1 AI model has memorized over 42% of Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, raising concerns about copyright infringement.

articles.title: Open AI Codex vs GitHub Copilot vs Claude | Testing & Benchmarks
articles.content: A comparison of OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, and Claude highlights their capabilities, with Claude standing out for secure, long-context code reasoning and explanation.
articles.summary: A comparison of OpenAI Codex, GitHub Copilot, and Claude highlights their capabilities, with Claude standing out for secure, long-context code reasoning and explanation.
